snippet.title: "Sonic Robo Blast" fangame - Zones 1-4 (And Zone 5 Frustration)
snippet.description:
http://info.sonicretro.org/Sonic_Robo_Blast

SRB2's roots, which may come as a surprise to some newbies.

I took a break at the Volcano Zone because:
1) The game was dragging out for a while
2) I was hitting practically every bad game glitch the game has
3) I had the password anyway, so I could go back and clear it later. And I probably will if there's enough requests for it or I have free time.

Also, due to how difficult this way to get working, I probably won't let the next segment or the next batch of fangames run as long.
